name: Flower Cannister
description: The Flower Cannister has a bejeweled touch with its delicate knob, and a playful spirit with its swivel top. Handmade from Shagreen or Shell, Bronze-Patina Brass, wood veneer interior. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Inspired by her parents, Kifu's collection embodies whimsical elements and is daring in design, using materials like shagreen, shells, and semi-precious stones. Please note, all shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight.
